sop.intro: This document will help you navigate through the Virginia Tech Winter and Summer session enrollment, whether you are a current VT student or Visiting/Non-degree seeking student.

task.tasktitle: How to register for summer classes
task.staging: Follow the steps below to submit your course requests and generate your class schedule. See specific dates for requesting courses here: http://registrar.vt.edu/dates-deadlines-accordion/Drop-Add.html.

ingredient.item: Completed pre-registration requirements (e.g. pay your fees, update medical records, etc.)
ingredient.note: Green check marks indicate completed registration requirements. All must be green to proceed to the first step of registration

step.action: Login to HokieSpa uing your VT PID and password.
step.note: You will be prompted to login with 2-Factor Authentication

step.action: Select the available term you wish to register, either Winter or Summer. Once you have selected the term, click “Continue”
Read the financial notice and click “Ok” to continue

steps.step: Enter your search criteria by selecting your desired subject from the drop down menu or typing it directly into the search bar and click “Search”

task.summary: Now that you've completed this task you can take your class
